author: costin
msg: Moved j2ee build to src/j2ee/build.xml, the main build.xml will just call
it. This should be done for other modules - it will increase the module
separation and simplify the development.
Fixed the j2ee interceptor to work with the latest changes.

author: costin
msg: Moved jk files to conf/jk, jserv files to conf/jserv.
Other modules/connectors may be added - each will have it's own
separate dir.
conf/ant will have various ant files used for tomcat, including templates
for webapp building, (automated ) admin tasks, etc.
PR:
Obtained from:
Submitted by:
Reviewed by:

author: costin
msg: Changed the location of jk and jserv files - now it's conf/jk, conf/jserv.
I don't know if this is the best location, but it's a step forward ( IMHO ).
( the pattern is similar with /etc, /etc/mail, /etc/www, etc organization -
each "component" have a directory ).
( I am happy with any conf/ organization that groups the files somehow -
please change it or -1 if you want )

author: costin
msg: - Removed jni_server.xml - it's out-of-date ( interceptors, etc).
- added the relevant config ( the jni adapter ) to server and server2.xml
( commented out )
- added a (manualy-generated) version of server.dtd. It is useful to document
the internal structure ( wich should be reasonably stable now ) and
for easy editing ( emacs :-). There are few problems with the parser.

author: costin
msg: - added few classes/jsps used to fix various bugs. I have no driver, but
I think it's better to have them checked in.
- removed unused code
